Posts.Content: Aug 7, 2010 02:17AM staystrong wrote: Dawn, Prayers do help, what helps is the support of your family and friends.  I am from toronto, Canada and was diagnosed with breast cancer again in 2009 after lumpectomy 5 years ago.  This time they wanted to do mastectomy,  I have two little kids and the oncologist gave me 5 days to be operated, I had my husband with me at the dr. and he asked a few questions to the Dr. which she did not like and today without the operation I am feeling more healthier and feel 25 years younger.  Moods are always affected but the stress will increase ur health problems.  My husband has done a lot of research in these few months and we have taken a lot of positive steps which has changed the way we look at all these things.  If you need help just shout or email me and we can provide u all the resources you need to feel better today and forever.
Posts.Title: Feeling extremely down today bluesgrl staystrong
